title: Update Instagram URL in “Follow Us” social links

requirements.text: Update the Instagram social link URL in the “Follow Us” section to exactly: https://www.instagram.com/myplaceatqueretaro

quotes: please change the social media link for Instagram with this one: " https://www.instagram.com/myplaceatqueretaro"

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/ContactSection.tsx, the Instagram entry in the socialLinks array uses href === "https://www.instagram.com/myplaceatqueretaro".
The Instagram icon link in the rendered “Follow Us” block navigates to https://www.instagram.com/myplaceatqueretaro in a new tab (target="_blank") and keeps rel="noopener noreferrer".
No other socialLinks (Facebook, YouTube) URLs are changed.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or any files in frontend/src/components/ui.
nonGoals: Do not change styling, layout, icons, or labels in the “Follow Us” section beyond updating the Instagram URL.
Do not add new social networks or remove existing ones.
No backend changes or data migrations.
